website_summaries.verdict: Contains tools, pots, and an impressive collection of 8 types of seeds, making this an excellent bonsai starter kit and a good value.
pros: Makes it easy to master the art of bonsai, as the kit includes everything you need to grow 8 types of trees from seeds
Comes with a user's manual, pots, soil discs, tools, and more
cons: A few packaging issues, including spilled seeds, upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: No much luck
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bonsai kit and was super excited about it. I followed the directions to a T and for some reason only 2 plants grew. One of them didn't last long before it died and the 2nd is still growing. I was incredibly sad that more of them didn't grow. I almost want to buy the pack again to retry, but I can't justify spending the amount of money for seeds when I didn't have any luck last time. I never interacted with the seller, but I don't think they refund for this.
customer_reviews.author: ilovebooks

customer_reviews.title: This is the 3rd company I have ordered start up ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd company I have ordered start up Bonsai kit. The first 2 didn't produce results. I planted my seeds from this kit 8 days ago and I already have sprouts in 3 out of 8 of the pots. I think the instructions were a lot more thorough and am looking forward to reading the free guide they just sent. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tavi girl

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pack - lots of extras!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product a few days ago. It was nice packaging and high quality components. Really it’s everything you need to get started growing bonsai. The box came with extras of everything and 8 different types of seeds, which was a nice addition. Each pot has a sign to mark the type of seed you are planting, so that it was easy to remember which seeds went where. Looking forward to seeing these little seedlings sprout!🌱🌱
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After following instructions to the letter and planting all the seeds 30 days ago, 4 of them have shown signs of growth. The Pinus, Entero, Delonix and (a very few) Jacaranda have sprouted. Nothing from the other 4. Given that the care instructions are nearly identical for each type of seed and half of them are showing progress, I think I can rule out user error. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: good value and variety
customer_reviews.text: this is an update to an earlier review. received a little over 3 weeks ago, planted the meta sequoia first as the seeds take no prep, not up yet. Delonix Regia planted 2 sprouted and now secondary leaves 2.5" tall in the provided pot/soil. Enterolobium planted 2, 1 sprouted and now secondary leaves just starting, 1.5" tall. Siberian Elm 5 planted, 3 sprouted, 3/8" tall and just getting the secondary leaves. Ficus R. 20 planted in plastic starter pots and my own soil mix, 2 sprouted, no secondary leaves yet. Jacaranda, Pinus, Ulmus, Camphor; not sprouted yet. still have 2+ weeks on that
customer_reviews.author: Kurt B. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Fun to watch grow.
customer_reviews.text: THe kit is perfect for beginners. Half of the types of seeds germinated, which is understandablesome yielded multiple seedlings so I am literally looking at grass grow and it is fascinating. Service was great too, I had a couple of questions and they responded fast and very kindly. I recommend if you are interested in plants or to teach children how nature behaves and how magical it is.
customer_reviews.author: fab

customer_reviews.title: only 1 tree sprouted
customer_reviews.text: I've been a avid gardener for over 40 years, starting many plants from seed. Out of 8 trees only 1 pack sprouted. Couldn't get refund as was told it could take up to 8 weeks for other seeds to sprout. Would have been great if all the seeds or at least one of each sprouted but since they didn't paid a fortune to get one tree, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Stiefer

customer_reviews.title: twice, feel wronged
customer_reviews.text: horrible experience. I tried this product twice. First time 1 of 3 that sprouted survived. My second purchase is failed... now I have 8 pots with no growth. Diligent about the temperature and each specific one's needs. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to see results!
customer_reviews.text: This was given to me as a gift. I enjoy gardening and have always wanted to try bonsai. This kit is wonderful! It includes everything you need for the beginner bonsai enthusaist. I really appreciate all the variety. I hope they all survive to sprout so I can nurture them into full grown specimens. Take your time and read the entire booklet provided as it is very helpful. Some seeds need to be soaked, some do not. I recommend this for anyone who likes to garden or has an interest in bonsai. It’s a great gift that will last for many years!
customer_reviews.author: DebbyBA

customer_reviews.title: Best bonsai starter kit out there!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bonsai starter kit out there by far ! Your not going to find another even close in quality especially for the price! Thank you so much I’m very excited to watch these little guys grow !
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great kit! Perfect place to start bonsai growing!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I just planted my trees about a month ago or so and one just started to bud yesterday! I’m pretty excited about it! The booklet was helpful and the tools and kit is great. However, I wish there was more info on how much to water etc. when they are still seedlings and not just grown trees. I don’t know anything about bonsais so directions for us newbies needs to be super detailed and specific. Otherwise, I can’t recommned enough!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: No! STOP, DO NOT PURCHASE.  Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. I planted the seeds according to directions in March. And it is now August 27. Not one seed sprouted out of hundreds. Oh BTW, I AM AN AVID GARDENER AND NEVER HAVE TROUBLE WITH SEEDS.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay Duran

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: First off the package was mangled, but luckily everything was there, 2nd, only 3 plants grew out of all the seeds I got. 3rd the soil only made enough for half a pot each. So my advice would be get your seeds elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: ric

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 seed sprouted
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions exactly as stated and only 1 seed sprouted. I hoped for a better outcome (at least half growth) but it was just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: EFisher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second kit I have received. The first kit only 4 plants sprouted. This second one only 2 have sprouted. I followed the instructions very carefully. During the process of soaking the seeds for 24 hours most of the seeds didn’t float. I’m so disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Desheles

customer_reviews.title: Fun to do with kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, he expressed a interest in growing Bonsai trees. We planted the seeds May 15, as of June 12, three have sprouted. Two look healthy the other, rather weak. Forget about the tools that come with the kit. The tools are cheap plastic garbage, we threw ours in the trash. We are not giving up on the other seeds yet. I guess I can say it's something fun to do with your kids.
customer_reviews.author: drk1992fu

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few weeks now and I have 3 out of the 8 different kinds of seeds sprouting! So far everything is going well! Have to be patient and Hope the other 5 sprout within the next few weeks. Everything came as I ordered is and very easy to follow instructions. I know this way will take a lot longer to actually get a tree but it is very rewarding and exciting!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: like other reviewers i'm very happy with the kit quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous about getting twice as many seeds as other comparable kits, but i have to say, like other reviewers i'm very happy with the kit quality so far and the clear instructions. We'll know it 6 weeks how everything looks and if i have sprouted seeds!! so far so good, would urge other potential buyers to not be afraid of this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great kit to start from seeds
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit. Instructions are clear and concise. I only started two seed types and one after a week has show movement as it pushes up through the soil. One review suggested to put plastic wrap to hold in moisture. That works. Will update when I see the sprouts. UPDATE: Planted two varieties on 7/31/18. The Enterolbium and the Delonix Regia. The Enterolbium has sprouted 1 seed in a week. Still waiting for other but I bet I’ll be successful! It’s 8/2/18
customer_reviews.author: John Watts

customer_reviews.title: Nice tools and packaging. Seeds could be way better
customer_reviews.text: Viable Pinus Aristata seeds, every seed sprouted from that species. None of my other species have spouted, and my Cinnamomum Camphora seeds all rotted. I’m a little upset because I know I didn’t overwater it, and I’ve been taking AMAZING care of all of the seeds, including making sure they get enough sunlight, turning the pots weekly for even growth, and giving them fertilizer every two weeks. Tools and booklet were nice, just had a problem with most of the seeds
customer_reviews.author: Madison M.

customer_reviews.title: Was hopeful, but let down.
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 trees, two of which are actually monkey pod trees ( Samanea saman) which weren't listed in any variation of the name. Many didn't even sprout, those that did died, even with proper growing conditions. I don't know if this kit was an odd exception, but I'm quite disappointed. I was very hopeful and loved the trees advertised. I almost want to try the kit again, but I don't think I want to spend the money on it again.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna S.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing. 1 of my seeds germinated in just a week. I would really recommend this product for everybody who wants to be a bonsai master
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 plants sprouted
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, it was two of the trees I was MOST hoping would come up... but I did actually want to have all 8 grow. Disappointed that I only got 2. It's nice to see them coming to life. Every day they look better and better.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Peach

customer_reviews.title: It looks great. I just planted my seeds this week and ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything that was described came in the box. It looks great. I just planted my seeds this week and will be patient and give my little seedlings plenty of care and time to grow. I have read that some seeds can take a few seasons to actually sprout. This product was with the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Best thing on amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the coolest thing I've ever bought on amazon in my life! I'm so tempted to buy another one just to do it all over again! Ive time lapsed sprouts all spring everyone wants one and I don't care who advises against starting from seed this was an experience of a lifetime and I'll never regret it!! Purchased Mar 14, recieved 2 days later and started it a few days after researching all species and today is April 2nd and I have 5 of 8 seeds sprouting ( including BOTH boiled seeds)!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Brashear

customer_reviews.title: Seem like the tools are already used by someone!
customer_reviews.text: Received the package today. Haven't tried to plant any seed yet but initial impression was not good. The tweezers package is damaged (partially opened) and the pruning shears looks like someone already used it before. Has soil on the blades and in the pouch. The lid of one containers was also opened. I am lucky because it was Delonix Regia seed container. If it were small seed container, the seeds might get lost during the shipping. Will update about the seeds later.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chang

customer_reviews.title: Fun project
customer_reviews.text: I planted about half the amount of each of the different seeds per the instructions. I got sprouts on 4 pots only. Going to get a different seed starter with a dome and try the rest with different germination techniques besides the directions.
customer_reviews.author: The Consumer

customer_reviews.title: About 6 weeks in photo
customer_reviews.text: I love my little Bonsai.. You must take care and follow the direction but at the stage I am now,( 7 weeks) , its very cool to see the leaves open during the day and "close "up at night.
customer_reviews.author: JGsilver and gold

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: This was the second type of starter kit I bought. Had no luck with first type, but with this kit I had every seed from four types of trees sprout. No luck with the other four, but in my eyes 50/50 is better then 0!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: I am so sad I was so excited to try this at home
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to get any of these to grow. I followed the directions to a Tee and I got half of them to sprout but then they quickly died. I am so sad I was so excited to try this at home. I did receive everything and I still have a couple more seeds to try. If I have luck with those I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete waist of money.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it negative ratings. Followed the directions to the letter and got a whole one plant to germinate. We got one bristle cone pine to came up. Don't waist the money. They were meant to be memorial plants for my kids after their grandpa died. Totally disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing grew
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and have still kept watering them. Nothing grew and I'm really good with plants. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chasadee Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Such fun and everything it said it was and more
customer_reviews.text: This is a very special product. Such fun and everything it said it was and more . I highly recommend this and I’m going to buy more to give as gifts to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time the little tubes with seeds in were ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time the little tubes with seeds in were all over the place came open and one spilled
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: this is a great idea. I have a green thumb
customer_reviews.text: Starting off, this is a great idea. I have a green thumb, but only four seeds grew. The booklet that comes with has very limited instructions. I would give it all stars if there was better instructions. Please do your research on the trees to know how to grow them.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a Christmas present for my dad and ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for my dad and he is so excited to start growing them! I bought this one because unlike others it came with the tweezers and snippers, even though he won't need those right away. The book (and guide they email you later) was very informative.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Easy starter kit & very reasonable price for 8 trees!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these & can’t wait to watch them grow! Super awesome seller & I’m sure I will be buying more products from them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teets08

customer_reviews.title: Some growth some need more patience.
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to grow from seeds. After 3 weeks, only 3 of them sprouted. Still waiting patiently on the rest and will do a 2nd attempt from the remaining seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Hoei L

customer_reviews.title: A mike-ologist's review
customer_reviews.text: Upon recieving, i did inventory. It came with everything that was listed, so no missing parts. The seeds all looked right (im an avid seed starter/collector) though i havent tried germinating any, so i cant attest to viability. Though seed packaging, labeling, and condition were satisfactory, so i dont foresee issues.
customer_reviews.author: mike p.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you follow water directions. I might have added to hot water and killed them.
customer_reviews.text: So far I only had this product for about 2-3 weeks. Only one plant has grown out of 7. But it has grown a lot in a few days. It does say it takes 2-6 weeks for them to start growing so I will be updating this in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Galambos

customer_reviews.title: Not entry level
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these kits nice kit one for gift I can't tell about there experience. But mine wasn't good only the seed didn't germinate on all of the seeds only 2 out of the 8 but could be doing something wrong with conditions.
customer_reviews.author: NYVINCHENZ

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 Germinated
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 of the seeds (not species of seeds, seeds) germinated. I followed all the directions to a tee and only have two plants to show for it. Really unfortunate since the whole package seemed to be well put together, but the seeds I got were duds.
customer_reviews.author: n/a

customer_reviews.title: Great seller! Great product
customer_reviews.text: Kit was as described and everything came in great. Only suggestion for the seller, is to package the discs in a plastic bag as to not get dust on everything. The products are what you would expect at the price point. A great kit to get you started in the bonsai world! I can't wait until I get to start trimming :)
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit, Great Seller.
customer_reviews.text: Every since I was young I dreamed of owning a cool bonsai tree. One day I logged on to Amazon and saw this the perfect little kit. I decided to try it out and I was very impressed with everything. It's a very high quality product and it shipped quick. I would recommend this to anyone who enjoys gardening and japenese culture.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for beginners or anyone interested and fascinated ...
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for beginners or anyone interested and fascinated with bonsai. Kit includes everything you need; seeds, biodegradable pots, soil, as well as easy to follow instructions and tools!
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose P. Marbury

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: I really love the variety that it gives you had a couple take within the 1st week of sowing them The only downfall that I find with this is the fact that I had a 29% germination rate which is rilly low if you ask me but all and all I love it
customer_reviews.author: Aaron rothfelder

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money....
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions as instructed. Only a couple seeds sprouted and then died the next day. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MELINDA W

customer_reviews.title: Good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for just over a month now and I had a several sprouts start. Three of the seeds haven't sorouted yet but might just take longer who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool so far, Only thing I dislike is that there is no instructions on how to really take care of the germinating seeds. No guidelines on how much he son or water to give them
customer_reviews.author: Gino L. Vieto

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself I love gardening. This kit was fun and easy to use. 6 out of the 8 plants sprouted and are growing so far.
customer_reviews.author: vickiculhane

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of seeds.
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are plenty of seeds in the containers. You will need more pots as I have used up the 8 for only 3 seed types. The seed look nice and well kept. So we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: DmgBeast

customer_reviews.title: Only 3
customer_reviews.text: Only three of the seeds started to grow or sprouted.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolay Petrov

customer_reviews.title: I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions to the T! They still haven’t even sprouted! I’ve had them for over a month. I’m really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victor zamudio

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: About what you could expect from a pack like these. Some of the seeds sprout and others don’t. But it’s fun for a little hobby starter
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Had everything I needed. Pretty thorough instructions. It's been a week since planting the seeds and I've got several little sprouts. You have to make sure the ones that required soaking actually took on water, I had to resoak some of them. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin S.

customer_reviews.title: Curious
customer_reviews.text: We were all pretty excited about are bonsai trees. None of them sprouted, not sure what we did wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it, i’m Still waiting for them to sprout ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it, i’m Still waiting for them to sprout but it’s still too early. But I love the variety of plants they gave, and they literally supply you with everything you’ll need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I have not started yet but its seems good quality 👍 I will update my comment soon.
customer_reviews.author: A.F

customer_reviews.title: Kit was well equipped with supplies and instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The kit came well equipped with supplies and instructions. My seeds have only been germinating for a week, so I cannot comment on the seed quality yet.
customer_reviews.author: pen name

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: None of them actually grew. We followed the instructions exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Sevi Miller

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: It’s been less than 2 weeks since receipt. Since sowing I’ve gotten one species to grow, and I’m hopeful the rest will sprout soon. The whole kit was well packaged and the directions were easy to follow. I’ll try to update this post in a couple weeks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, great quality seeds, and excellent service
customer_reviews.text: The kit came in excellent condition. The seeds all appear to be good quality and packaged well. Instructions are clear and easy to follow. I am VERY happy I ordered this kit and can't wait to see my plants growing! Customer service is fantastic. I will definitely purchase with Ashbrook Outdoors again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: As described, fast shipping. Looks pretty easy to start, but of course have to wait to see the result.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 viable species
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first bonsai kit, and I've been doing bonsai for a bit now. I planted the viable seeds (ones that sank when soaked), and only 2 sprouted: the delonix regia and the pinus aristata. All the others were duds.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Really cool kit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit with a great variety of seeds to start. Everything you need to get going and I was impressed by the follow up emails received after purchase. I would definitely recommend it to a friend or purchase another as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Brandin Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Best Bonsai Tree for the Perfect Price!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Product is great and I can't wait to start on my Bonsai tree. For the price, you can't beat it. Shipping barely took 2 days, and packaging was safe and secure. Will definitely order again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Abney

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Been 5 weeks since I planted. 4 of 8 species sprouted, total of 20 small trees. Now in separate small pots. Good starter set. Will add info if others species sprout...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D Kuntz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions for all phases growing
customer_reviews.text: This kit really does have it all to start Bonsai growing. Easy to follow instructions for all phases growing.
customer_reviews.author: Smile :)

customer_reviews.title: Seeds are duds
customer_reviews.text: The kit does come with everything you need but the seeds dont sprout after following instructions to the letter. I have grown many bonsai trees from seeds and these seeds were all duds.
customer_reviews.author: Shanan Belmore

customer_reviews.title: However everything looks good and arrived in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Though this is not for me it's a Christmas gift for a friend ! However everything looks good and arrived in good condition. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, planting the seeds was fun and therapeutic
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, planting the seeds was fun and therapeutic. No seedlings yet, hopefully in the next 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift and the individual hated it. Whatever soil came with it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and the individual hated it. Whatever soil came with it came with bugs and house gnats.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pollino

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Kit has everything needed to start the process. Three weeks after starting, we have seeds sprouting. Daily monitoring and soil moisture checks have been key to growth. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: SEAN LINN

customer_reviews.title: Not even a sprout
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions meticulously, but not a single seed sprouted. I gave it several months to be sure, but it wasn't worth the money to try.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Seeds seem old
customer_reviews.text: Half of seeds didn’t germinate and I am an experienced gardener. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: dbz fan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived as stated. I can't wait to start. Per the instructions I am waiting on more sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Coopet

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to try growing these!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to try these!! The handbook you emailed me is great and has a lot of great tips in it! thank you for making sure I am completely satisfied cuz I am!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Giger

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too complex for anyone side from a botanist! Only 1 species sprouted.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mahan

customer_reviews.title: They don’t grow
customer_reviews.text: Planted all seeds as instructed. Only 2 of the 8 germinate. The 2 that did are doing great. The others are in the garbage. 25% success rate is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: James Deprospo

customer_reviews.title: Complete kit with easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this kit, the seeds come in separate vials and the instructions were well written and easy to follow. All the seeds are planted, just waiting excitedly to see which ones will grow first!
customer_reviews.author: missy1

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a co-worker and he loved it! He's been keeping me updated and said they're all sprouting!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie Bosley

customer_reviews.title: My new babies
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions as close as possible, and after 9 days, my delonix and pinus seeds have sprouted! Was fully expecting to wait at least 2 weeks to see anything, but they surprised me today!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Grass

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed trying to grow Bonsai trees
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed trying to grow Bonsai trees, I have had only 2 start, it is 4 weeks now. The only kind that grew are the Pinus Atistata. It is a good kit for people that like the challenge of trying these.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit. They include everything you need and more. I have not had a chance to start growing them yet but I opened it up and they put together a nice package. Can’t wait to grow them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to start and I have seedlings up ! Nothing negative
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice but lacks more information
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and has all the necessary rings for sparring a bonsai but it doesnt say what to do next after they grow a bit
customer_reviews.author: CarolineA

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: We are waiting to plant the seeds until it warms up a bit but at first glance this kit is amazing. My husband is an expert gardener and is now getting into bonsai, I bought this for him for our anniversary and he was very pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Psychobaby

customer_reviews.title: ... on time and all pieces were in the box nicely organized. I didn't receive a hard copy of ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my shipment on time and all pieces were in the box nicely organized. I didn't receive a hard copy of the manual, but did get a download link before receiving my shipment. Very pleased!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool kit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool kit. First time trying to grow Bonsai so it’s nice that there is 8 in the kit, incase I’m not successful with a few of em.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in perfect condition. Booklet was instructional and easy to follow instructions to a "T". Would definitely recommend, if you're looking for a new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Dani ward

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic starter kit for first time growers!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the seed varieties! My grandson is excited to start growing! Everything one would need to begin Bonsai. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Solid starter kits
customer_reviews.text: Have had great success with this starter kit. Research more about the seeds and growing the types of trees though, don't just follow the booklet
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hoefer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER excited. Hopefully they grow
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. Planted three so far. SUPER excited. Hopefully they grow!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Would happily recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, super fast shipping. They truly care about their customers, and as re in touch every step of the way! Would happily recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Quality kit
customer_reviews.text: I like how this kit has all you need to start beautiful little trees, high quality kit
customer_reviews.author: D. Muisener

customer_reviews.title: Trying my Bonsai Green Thumb
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly and my results were quicker that expected!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShawniiDaze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: like this kit so much just start planted one by one have everything included
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Great Bonsai Kit!
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks we started to see a lot of little buds. Great starter kit with great seeds that actually grow! I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love the kit
customer_reviews.text: Love the kit. The only thing I would change is have the labels printed so I didn't have to do them by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I planted my trees 3 weeks ago and 2 have sprouted so far. The directions are easy to understand. I am new to gardening and have had success so far.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pena
